exceptions.exn: In environment b_nat : nat Hb_nat : (2 <= b_nat)%nat b := Z.of_nat b_nat : Z Hb : 2 <= b u, n : nat H1 : (u <= alpha_nat (S n))%nat H2 : rem (alpha_nat (S n)) 2 = 1%nat Unable to unify "(alpha_nat ?M1506 <= b_nat * alpha_nat (S ?M1506))%nat" with "(alpha_nat (S n) <= alpha_nat (S n))%nat".

original: destruct (find_odd_alpha u) as [n [H1 H2]]. exists (S n). split. - apply le_trans with (alpha_nat (S n)). + apply H1. + apply alpha_nat_le. - apply H2.
